schemaLabel: Wikidata organization class derived from PM20 ID
dataLabel: Get all items with PM20 ids starting with 'co/'
queryMap: SPARQL '''PREFIX wdt: <http://www.wikidata.org/prop/direct/> PREFIX wd: <http://www.wikidata.org/entity/> select ?item where {  ?item wdt:P4293 ?pm20Id . filter(regex(?pm20Id, '^co/'))} limit 20'''@START
